titleStmt.title: William H. Sidell to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1545

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
HEAD-QUARTERS ACT'G ASST. PROVOST MARSHAL GENERAL,
STATE OF KENTUCKY,
Louisville, Ky December 24 1863
Hon Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of Ky.

Sir Herewith I have the honor to transmit certified copy of a communication this day received from Maj Genl Grant. in reply to your letter of the 8" inst to these Head Quarters, a copy of which was forwarded to him, in regard to the recent Order of Genl Hurlbut conscripting all able bodied men in his District.
I respectfully transmit this for your information.

I have the honor
to remain Very
Respectfully Your
Obt Svt
W. H. Sidell
15 reg I and asst P M G for Ky
per Geo M Lane "
Capt I C & Adj
